extendedInfo.description: This is an Android client for the amazing wallpaper website Wallbase.Features include:â Browse, set and save over 1 million HD wallpapersâ Browse popular wallpapersâ Browse random wallpapersâ Browse popular tagsâ Search by keyword/tags/colorâ Filter by resolution, rating and 4chan image boardABOUT WALLBASEWallbase (http://wallbase.cc) is a website which scrapes wallpapers from 4chan (http://4chan.org/) and then allows users to tag/moderate the wallpapers. If you find a wallpaper which is tagged/classified incorrectly then please visit the wallpaper on the Wallbase website directly to modify it. Please also visit the Wallbase website for handling copyright related issues.WARNINGThis application is of high maturity. Do not use it if you think you will be offended. The NSFW category cannot be included due to Android's no porn policy.CREDITSPicasso (http://square.github.io/picasso/)Color Picker (https://code.google.com/p/color-picker-view/)

reviews.title: Log In Capability!
reviews.comment: I can\'t complain much. This is, by far, the easiest way to get premium wallpapers from Wallbase. It would be 10 stars if I could log in with my account. Oh wait... :P
reviews.author: Dexter Jay Baldonado

reviews.title: Back in working order
reviews.comment: And back to being my wallpaper picker of choice
reviews.author: Waris Amir Mohammad

reviews.title: I love this app, however...
reviews.comment: I\'d be far more inclined to purchase the pro key and give it a better rating if the UI could follow the design of some of your other incredible applications... not sure why this one is so unappealing when the others are jaw dropping.  Thanks for the quick response Tim! I upped the rating a star and now feel confident buying the pro key knowing money will help further the development of your Wallbase application. Thanks again!
reviews.author: Dale Kimball

reviews.title: Failed to load
reviews.comment: It didn\'t load any wallpapers for me on my Gs3
reviews.author: Angel Luperena

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: Back to normal! Good job dev
reviews.author: michael kinsey

reviews.title: FC 100% of the time
reviews.comment: It\'s great while it actually works. If I scroll through a few hundred images the app force closes every single time. Not kidding. 100% of the time. Brings me back to homescreen.

reviews.comment: All the bugs fixed..  Loved d app...
